title: Cocktail shaker in the form of a penguin
description: Ovoid body (a) and cover (b) in the form of a standing penguin with flat wings applied at sides, and flat base in form of feet; strap handle at back.  Cover (b), in the form of penguin's head and shoulders, with hinged beak as spout.
name: Cocktail shaker in the form of a penguin
